review: So if you need a way to stream Netflix streaming to your TV directly at the cheapest possible price get this.  If you want good Netflix streaming get a Roku or a TV that supports Netflix directly or use your Dish Network connection or your gaming station or even your blueray player.  Used my Chromecast  a coupe times and realized this is pretty much no longer useful.  Too limiting and poor quality images, so...... Pass!
